Crimes Against Senior Citizens: 

 There has been a significant rise in crimes targeting senior citizens in Karnataka. This includes murder, assault, and financial exploitation.These cases often demand extra attention due to the vulnerability of the victims. 

 

 CYBERCRIME: 

 With Karnataka tech-savvy population, cybercrimes like online fraud, hacking, and identity theft are on the rise.These cases can be complex and require specialized investigation techniques. 

 /n/n PROPERTY OFFENSES: 

 Cases like theft, burglary, and land grabbing are unfortunately common.Efficient investigation and property recovery are crucial aspects of these cases. 

 CORRUPTION: 


Corruption cases involving public officials are a major concern for the public.These can be challenging due to the potential influence of those involved. 

 ORGANIZED CRIME: 

 drug trafficking, illegal gambling, and other forms of organized crime pose a serious threat to public safety.These cases require extensive investigation and collaboration between different police units. 

 

 MISSING PERSONS: 

 Finding missing individuals, especially children, is a top priority for police.These cases can be very time-sensitive and emotionally charged.
